    • Method Detail

      • getListInfo

      • saveInfo

        org.json.simple.JSONObject saveInfo(int id,
                                  java.lang.String desc,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  java.lang.String title)
        Used to save message details into database and it will return updated message id.
        Parameters:
        id - the primary key of info.
        desc - notification or error message description.
        type - message type.
        title - message title.
        Returns:
        return just updated message id.
